messages.title: YOUR SEAT COUNTS AND EVERY SINGLE VOTE WILL COUNT
messages.content: Some people say Jeremy Corbyn can't possibly become Prime Minister and it doesn't matter who you vote for in York Outer constituency.

messages.title: BACK ME AND JULIAN STURDY WITH YOUR POSTAL VOTE HERE IN YORK OUTER CONSTITUENCY
messages.content: If you want to make a real difference, back me by voting for my candidate, Julian Sturdy, in your local constituency of York Outer.

messages.title: MAKING BREXIT A SUCCESS IS CENTRAL TO OUR NATIONAL INTEREST
messages.content: As a nation, we face the most important period in our lifetime. Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest – and it is central to your own security and prosperity.

messages.title: THIS IS A UNIQUE AND CRUCIAL ELECTION FOR OUR COUNTRY
messages.content: By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand I can ensure we guarantee our economic security.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Negotiate the best Brexit deal, ensuring economic security and prosperity.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting for the local Labour candidate is considered a vote for Jeremy Corbyn with potential for chaos and risk to the country's economic security.

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest. It is crucial to negotiate the best Brexit deal to protect economic security and prosperity.

quotes.text: Or A Coalition of Chaos with Jeremy Corbyn
Labour under Jeremy Corbyn are a clear and present danger to our economy and our security. They are not fit to negotiate Brexit.

images.caption: Theresa May standing next to a sign that says 'Theresa May and Julian Sturdy. Strong and stable leadership for York Outer and for Britain'
Comparison image with 'Or A Coalition of Chaos with Jeremy Corbyn', featuring images of political figures.
